data.persona: I am a noble member of the Royal family.  I was born into my position.  I live in a castle, wear fine clothing and travel in the finest carriages.
data.description:
You are in the holy alter.
The altar is big and it is also beautiful, it has many precious metals around it. It is said that the altar has a sample of every element in the kingdom, the most precious and unique stones decorate it.
The thief is here.

You are carrying a bag and an sleeping bag.

data.short_motivation: I want to hide from the theif.
data.mid_motivation: I should train to be stronger.
data.long_motivation: I should train in a class on fighting.
